organic_results.title: Model students? Teachers' perceptions and expectations of their Asian and White students
organic_results.snippet: Asian students have been considered" model students" by their teachers. This study examines the various components of the" model student," in particular the teachers' perceptions of the behavioral and emotional characteristics of their Asian students vis-a-vis white students at both the elementary and secondary level. Significant differences were noted for the general categories of emotional stability and academic competence. Multiple classification analysis was conducted to ascertain the effects of ethnicity, father's …
